email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Can you check if there’s any flexibility? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. We’re almost there. If you can bring it down to $47.00, we can close this today. Also, can you confirm the laytime details? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your flexibility. The owner has agreed to $47.25 per metric ton, which is the best we can do. Laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours for loading and 48 hours for discharge. Let me know if this is acceptable, and I’ll draft the charter party. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that works for us. Let’s proceed at $47.25 per metric ton. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ll have the charter party drafted and sent to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working together on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah.
